climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: 【Pillows to Relieve Neck & Back Pain】Our neck pillow fits automatically according to the body curve to relieve and release your muscles and physical and mental pressure. With the personalized customized shape, the memory foam pillows perfectly to your head, neck and shoulders for the perfect combination of comfort and edge-to-edge support. Bringing a reduction of stress in the cervical vertebra and spine. Improving sleep and relieving neck and shoulder pain discomfort, rejuvenating your body.

【Safe & Odorless-Premium Memory Foam Pillows】The contour pillow is made of CertiPUR-US and Oeko-Tex certified memory foam, which provides amazing comfort and soft yet sturdy support for sleep. When lying on our foam pillows, it feels like floating on water or clouds, without any pressure on your skin. Special 3 seconds fast rebound memory foam won't change its shape and firmness due to season. Unleash your best sleep with our neck pillow-the ultimate blend of comfort, style, and quality!

【Cooling and Washable Pillowcase & Special Cloud Design】The sleeping pillow comes with ice silk pillowcase, which is made of soft comfortable ice silk fabric and mesh sides, removable and machine-washed. The pillowcase is made of COLD SILK TECHNOLOGY FABRIC, perfectly fitting the skin keep you cool all night long. Furthermor, the contour neck pillow has special cloud design let you instantly feel like lying on the clouds -Free and Relaxed.Give you the comfortable sleep you want!

【2 Personalized Height in A pillow for Any Sleep Style】-Do you often toss and turn because you can't find the height that suits you? Bespillow cervical pillow helps you to fix this trouble. Our neck pillow offer two different heights (5.1''/3.5'') The ergonomic and supportive pillow for neck pain is designed for multiple sleeping positions, such as side sleeping, supine, stomach sleeping, back sleeping and low pillow sleepers etc. No need to buy a new pillow to change your loft needs.

【Want a no-worry purchase experience?】You spend about one-third of your life sleeping, so a good pillow is a must-have. Bespillow is a brand of devoted pillows for neck and shoulder pain. We strive for the quality of our products.This cervical pillow is also a great gift for yourself, your parents, friends & colleagues, long-term use will greatly improve the quality of sleep.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Discover a Whole New Level of Comfort Pillows to Relieve Neck & Back Pain Let you spend a sweet sleep with peace on mind It is removable with a zipper, machine-washable Next page 1 Safety And Health 2 Gorgeous Feeling 3 Cool&Soft Comfort in One 4 Washable Pillowcase

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful soft pillow!!
reviews.reviewText: I like this product from Bespillow. I like the firmness. The pillow feels softer than the pillows I tried from the same company. The pillow maintains its shape well, and doesn’t flatten out over time. There are two sides to sleep on the pillow. One side is higher than the other to sleep on. I prefer the lower side. So, having this option is great. It’s odorless memory foam, and does not have bad new pillow odor. The cover is soft and breathable, keeping me cool throughout the night. It is also washable, which is a plus.I am a side and stomach sleeper, but I have no problem sleeping either way with this pillow. I’ve been waking up with no neck pain or shoulder pain. The sleep has been more deeper and restful.In summary, the pillow has exceeded my expectations in terms of comfort, support, and overall sleep quality. Its high-quality memory foam, breathable cover, and thoughtful design make it a top choice for anyone seeking a restful night's sleep. I highly recommend the pillow to those looking for a durable and supportive pillow that can transform their sleep experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great pillow for my cervical arthritis!
reviews.reviewText: This is a very nice pillow. It is sturdy, but soft. It is firm enough to support an aging neck that is predisposed to flare-ups due to arthritis, yet very comfortable. It is cool to the touch, which is a nice feature as well though I don't feel the coolness as much when I have a pillowcase on it. It arrives very compressed, but never fear, it will expand to its proper shape and works like a charm!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars As someone who has used contour pillows for over 30 years, I'm very satisfied.
reviews.reviewText: I used it for the first time a couple of nights ago. I normally wouldn't write a review so quickly after trying a product like this because it's important to use it for a while to really get a feeling for it. However, I've used contour pillows for over 30 years, so I think I know exactly what I'm looking for, what to expect, and what I like and don't like.I love this pillow. It’s more firm than my previous one, so it gives better support for when I’m lying on my back, which reduces snoring and air flow interruption. My wife said she sleeps better now as well because of that (because I don't keep waking her up!). It’s also longer than my previous 3 contour pillows, and I really like the bigger size. It means I don’t have to adjust the pillow during the night. On other shorter pillows, sometimes I would get to the edge as I roll around, and I would wake up because I was off the pillow. That hasn't happened with this one (due to the additional length).I'm about 5'9 and use the higher contoured side. I think if I were a smaller person I'd probably want to flip it around to use the other side of the contour, but the higher side works perfectly for me. As I said, the pillow is on the firmer side, so it gives a lot of support, but it's soft enough that I can lie on my side as well. I like to sleep in all positions, so this is important to me.I can't say how long it will last (because I've only just started using it), but it feels just as high quality as any of my previous pillows, so I would expect it to last as long. I generally use my pillows for 4-5 years before replacing them, and don't doubt this will hold up.Of note, it's lighter than my previous pillow, which I like. I do like to flip the pillow around sometimes (if I sleep on my stomach), so the lighter weight makes that easier. I realize now that my previous one was too heavy.For the price I paid (which was a lot cheaper than my previous pillow), I consider this a steal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Smooth feel, high quality, almost feels cold lol
reviews.reviewText: This pillow is one of the coldest feeling pillows I've ever used by far lol. So that part is great. It is also very high quality and doesn't feel cheap at all. Only reason I took off 1 star is because it is too firm in my opinion. I mean you really have to push your head into it pretty dang hard for it to give in at all.I'll probably end up using this pillow in my recliner somehow rather than sleeping on it. I really think it will be great for my back, under my legs, or even to sit on as a seat cushion. It is def too good a pillow not to use. Just too firm to sleep comfortably on.Maybe after I use it a while in my recliner it will soften up some and I'll try sleeping on it again in a couple months.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best pillow ever!
reviews.reviewText: I have severe neck problems. Arthritis and bone spurs with muscle tightness and pain. I have tried many different pillows. I decided to try a cervical pillow which I'd avoided thinking it didn't look comfortable. I reviewed a lot of them. This one was the least expensive but looked just like the others. I ordered it and I love it.The pillow is soft and cool to the touch. It gently cradles my neck yet offers support. It works well whether sleeping on my back or side. I'm now waking without a headache and stiffness. It's a great pillow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have neck pain and was looking for a pillow that would help me sleep better. This pillow is too low/soft for my neck injuries/pain. It needs to be double the thickness then maybe it will help. After reading the reviews I thought it would help, but it does not. Maybe if I buy another one and double stack them they might. But very disappointed in this pillow

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy pillow thats firm yet plush
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a firm pillow. This was the closest I could find to my older pillow. The pillow itself is firm and contours to your head. It's a very comfortable sleep. The material on the outside seems high quality. I expect to keep this pillow for years to come. Price for value is there. I recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I often wake up with a headache and stiff neck and I have tried many different pillows. This one worked perfectly. Not too soft or too firm. And no more stiff neck or headache in the morning. The pillow case is very silky and stays cool. I am very pleased with this pillow.
La mejor almohada que he comprado en años, muy confortable no muy firme ni muy suave es perfecta y fresca!

reviews.reviewTitle: Very comfortable and nice on the neck
reviews.reviewText: Very comfy and feels great on the neck
